revised_title: Forecasting and Understanding the African Armyworm Outbreaks
tldr: This article discusses the progress and developments in forecasting outbreaks of the African armyworm, a migrant moth, and its impact on agriculture in eastern Africa. The authors describe the development of a forecasting service and an expert system to predict the occurrence of outbreaks, as well as the use of historical data to create rules of thumb for forecasting. The main challenges in forecasting armyworm outbreaks remain the carry-over from one season to the next and understanding moth migration and behavior.
